thread.title: Nokia 5, Nokia 3 and Nokia 6 launched: Top specs, price and everything you need to know : Features, News - India Today
thread.title_full: Nokia 5, Nokia 3 and Nokia 6 launched: Top specs, price and everything you need to know : Features, News - India Today

author: India Today Tech
title: Nokia 5, Nokia 3 and Nokia 6 launched: Top specs, price and everything you need to know : Features, News - India Today
text:
RAM: 2GB RAM 
Internal storage: 16GB internal storage. There is option to add a microSD card. 
Screen: 5-inch screen with HD resolution. The screen has a layer of 2.5D curved Gorilla Glass. 
Rear camera: 8-megapixel camera with F2 lens. 
Front camera: 8-megapixel camera with F2 lens. 84 degrees of field of view. 
Dimensions: 143.4 x 71.4 x 8.48 mm 
Software: Android Nougat. 
Battery: 2650 mAh Special features 
-- The Nokia 5 has a metal frame and plastic body. Although it looks pretty neat, at least in photos. 
-- Nokia says that the phone's screen has a brightness of 450 nits and special coating that will help users read stuff on the screen even in direct sunlight. 
-- The Nokia 3, just like Nokia 5, uses clean Android users interface. Updates will come regularly and on time. 
-- Nokia 3 too comes with Android Assistant. Nokia 6 
We earlier wrote about Nokia 6 here. And you can check that here . But apart from that on Sunday night Nokia also announced the special version of Nokia 6 called Arte. This version will have: 
-- Piano black finish, similar to the iPhone's Jet Black finish. 
-- It will have 4GB RAM and 64GB internal storage. Availability: The new Nokia phones will be available in Q2 and that is also when we can expect them to come to India. This means, In April or after that the Nokia 6, the Nokia 3 and the Nokia 5 will be available in India. 
India price: For now India-specific prices are not known. But global prices are available. The Nokia 6 will cost Euros 229 for regular version and Euros 299 for special variant. The Nokia 5 will cost Euros 189 and the Nokia 3 will have a starting price of Euros 139.
